div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1927 Taranto, Calabria, 1933 (1061) Burial: c. 335-330 B.C. (Stazio) Contents: AR Taras Heracleia Velia Alexander, son of Neoptolemus: 3 Disposition: Vlasto 2 (Cat. 166, 171), from this hd. though the date is given as 1934 Note in ANS Stazio, AIIN 1965-7, p. 54
